title: SCP-3272
content:

[[include info:start]]
**SCP-3272:** 하늘에서 남자가 내려와, 할렐루야!
**저자:** [[*user TheMightyMcB]]
**원작:** https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-3272
**역자:** [[*user Aiken Drum]]
**저자에 대해서:**
* http://ko.scp-wiki.net/themightymcb-s-author-page
**특별 감사:**
[[*user MaliceAforethought]], [[*user Crashington]], [[*user Gee0765]], [[*user T Rutherford]], [[*user Veiedhimaedhr]], [[*user Ihp]], [[*user Jekeled]], [[*user Pr10r]], [[*user Swaghetti]], [[*user Rattles]], and [[*user Roget]].
